constituent: stalk, flowers, spool, clod, toilet paper, crotch, soil, dirt, ground
koohiiStory1: Suggestion: Replace "spool" with "toilet paper/roll". Reasons: (1) Toilet paper/roll usually comes on a spool. (2) Toilet paper is used to clean the soil off your crotch. Story: Just get a flower and carefully wrap some toilet paper around its stalk. Spool also appears in suspicious (#716), lightly (#717), diameter (#882), sutra (#1360).
koohiiStory2: PRIMITIVE: soiled crotch = soiled underwear. To precent anyone from picking the beautiful flower, the gardner hung soiled underwear on the stalk.
myStory: nhánh nhỏ ra hoa và lá. hoa thêm vào đất.
